content:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, down -11.07 
            points to 19815.70, a move of  -0.06%. 
            On a point basis, the blue-chip index traded in its narrowest daily range in three years.
            The S&P 500 SPX, edged 0.96 points lower to 2268.85, 
            a move of 0.04%, while the Nasdaq Composite Index COMP, tacked on 
            0.12%, or 6.89 points, to 5545.62.
title: Daily Market Snapshot
